"data protection is a human right! why do we give away our personal data so carelessly to corporations? #dataprotection #privacy"

in this tweet, i'm expressing my concern about the importance of protecting personal information and data privacy. as a german native, i'm emphasizing that data protection should be considered a fundamental human right. the hashtag #datenschutz is commonly used in germany to raise awareness about data protection issues. by asking the rhetorical question "warum geben wir unsere persönlichen daten so leichtfertig an konzerne aus?" (why do we give away our personal data so carelessly to corporations?), i'm encouraging my followers to think critically about their online behavior and the potential consequences of sharing their personal information with large corporations.
